text.title: Magnitude 7.5 earthquake hits Afghanistan
text.head: Magnitude 7.5 earthquake hits Afghanistan
Sister link
Realted news
text.p: "Strong earthquake hits Pakistan, north India, Afghanistan" — Wikinews, October 8, 2005
